metadata.title: CVE-2021-22230 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Improper code rendering while rendering merge requests could be exploitedto submit malicious code. This vulnerability affects GitLab CE/EE 9.3 andlater through 13.11.6, 13.12.6, and 14.0.2.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
